Top-requested sites to log in to services provided by the state Learn about the Massachusetts Alternative Energy Portfolio Standard, including CHP, Renewable Thermal, Fuel Cells, and Waste-to-Energy. Massachusetts' Alternative Energy Portfolio Standard (APS) was established to complement the RPS Program, providing requirements and incentives for alternative electricity technologies.
